job_tasks.phrase: align technical solutions with strategic goals
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'align technical solutions with strategic goals' directly speaks to understanding the business context and ensuring technical work supports broader company objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: translate business needs into technical requirements
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly states the ability to convert business demands into actionable technical specifications.

job_tasks.phrase: architecture design and maintenance of Next Generation Distributed Storage, including distributed block storage, object storage, file storage etc.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and maintaining storage systems, particularly distributed ones, falls under data engineering as it involves building the infrastructure for data storage and access.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure the architecture to meet SDS (Software Defined Storage) scenarios, HCI scenarios and hybrid cloud scenarios.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves designing data storage architectures to fit specific deployment models (Software Defined Storage, HCI, hybrid cloud), which is a core data engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: development of Reference Architectures and technology standards based on Infrastructure Building Blocks, that can be offered as services to our internal customers
job_tasks.justification: Creating reference architectures and standards for infrastructure services is a key aspect of data engineering, focusing on the foundational components for data management.

job_tasks.phrase: support complex Storage & Backup devices, including SAN, NAS and Backup solutions across all tiers
job_tasks.justification: Supporting and managing storage and backup devices is part of the data engineering lifecycle, ensuring data availability and integrity.

job_tasks.phrase: design, implementation, security and availability of Storage, Backups and SAN infrastructure, based on business requirements
job_tasks.justification: This encompasses the end-to-end responsibility for storage infrastructure, including its design, implementation, and operational aspects, which are all data engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: complex provisioning, advanced maintenance, data replication, disaster recovery, data migration
job_tasks.justification: These are all core data engineering activities related to managing and maintaining data storage systems and ensuring business continuity.

job_tasks.phrase: Write technical design and build documentation for storage infrastructure
job_tasks.justification: Documentation of storage infrastructure design and build processes is essential for data engineering, ensuring clarity and maintainability.

job_tasks.phrase: technology strategy, engineering standards, methodologies, task-plans and best practices for Storage Engineering
job_tasks.justification: Defining strategy, standards, and best practices for storage engineering is a high-level data engineering responsibility focused on the overall infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure 100 % availability for our engineering, manufacturing and IT applications.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring high availability for critical applications is a key operational concern, directly related to maintaining robust infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: operate in complex, highly-secure, highly-available, operations-centric datacenter environments
job_tasks.justification: This describes the operational environment and requirements, focusing on maintaining and managing infrastructure in a production setting.

job_tasks.phrase: interact with other technology domain experts as required, to build and maintain the Storage and Backups solutions in those datacenter environments
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with other experts to build and maintain solutions in datacenter environments highlights operational collaboration and infrastructure management.

job_tasks.phrase: adhering to tight operations, security, and procedural models
job_tasks.justification: Adhering to operational and security models is a crucial aspect of operations engineering, ensuring systems run smoothly and securely.

soft_skills.phrase: work with various engineering, devops and product management teams
interact with other technology domain experts as required
demonstrate a high level of technical expertise to support complex Storage & Backup devices
Responsible for architecture design and maintenance
Responsible for the development of Reference Architectures and technology standards

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on traditional storage infrastructure, including SAN, NAS, and backup solutions. While it mentions "Next Generation Distributed Storage" and "SDS," it lacks any mention of generative AI, LLMs, or related technologies, making it a core infrastructure and data engineering role rather than a GenAI Engineer.
